languages.text: "Возможно. Но на что они рассчитывают? Недосдачу не скрыть, тем более устранением нашей делегации. Губернатор словно загоняет себя в тупик..."

"That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."
languages.original_text: "Возможно. Но на что они рассчитывают? Недосдачу не скрыть, тем более устранением нашей делегации. Губернатор словно загоняет себя в тупик..."

traits.locale_text: "That is possible. But how can they possibly expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

"That is possible. But how can they possibly expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

"That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

"That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

"That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

"That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

languages.text: "Das ist möglich. Aber wie können sie glauben, dass das funktionieren würde? Zehnthinterziehung lässt sich nicht vertuschen, schon gar nicht, indem man unsere Delegation eliminiert. Es ist, als würde der Gouverneur sich selbst in eine Ecke drängen ..."
languages.original_text: "That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist möglich. Aber wie können sie glauben, dass das funktionieren würde? Zehnthinterziehung lässt sich nicht vertuschen, schon gar nicht, indem man unsere Delegation eliminiert. Es ist, als würde der Gouverneur sich selbst in eine Ecke drängen ..."

languages.text: « C'est une possibilité, mais comment pourraient-ils espérer que leur stratagème fonctionne ? La fraude à la dîme ne peut pas être cachée, surtout pas en éliminant notre délégation. Le gouverneur se serait mis lui-même dans l'impasse. »
languages.original_text: "That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une possibilité, mais comment pourraient-ils espérer que leur stratagème fonctionne ? La fraude à la dîme ne peut pas être cachée, surtout pas en éliminant notre délégation. Le gouverneur se serait mis lui-même dans l'impasse. »

languages.text: 「それはあり得ますね。ですが、どうしてそれでうまくいくと思えるのでしょう？租税のがれは隠し通せるものではありません。ましてや、私たちの代表団を消したところで無理でしょう。総督は、自分で自分を追い詰めているようなものです…」
languages.original_text: "That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

traits.locale_text: 「それはあり得ますね。ですが、どうしてそれでうまくいくと思えるのでしょう？租税のがれは隠し通せるものではありません。ましてや、私たちの代表団を消したところで無理でしょう。総督は、自分で自分を追い詰めているようなものです…」

languages.text: «Es posible, pero ¿cómo podrían esperar que funcione? La evasión del diezmo no es algo que se pueda encubrir, y menos eliminando nuestra delegación. Es como si el gobernador estuviera intentando acorralarse a sí mismo...».
languages.original_text: "That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible, pero ¿cómo podrían esperar que funcione? La evasión del diezmo no es algo que se pueda encubrir, y menos eliminando nuestra delegación. Es como si el gobernador estuviera intentando acorralarse a sí mismo...».

languages.text: “这确实有可能，但那些人怎么会真的指望这种手段能起作用？什一税是逃无可逃的，若是想通过消灭代表团来逃税，更是绝对行不通。看起来，就像是那个总督亲手把自己逼上了死路……”
languages.original_text: "That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

traits.locale_text: “这确实有可能，但那些人怎么会真的指望这种手段能起作用？什一税是逃无可逃的，若是想通过消灭代表团来逃税，更是绝对行不通。看起来，就像是那个总督亲手把自己逼上了死路……”

languages.text: "Bu dediğiniz mümkün ama işe yaramasını beklemeleri absürt. Aşar kaçırmanın ortaya çıkması kaçınılmazdır, hele ki heyetimizi ortadan kaldırarak asla önüne geçemezler. Vali, kendi kendisini köşeye sıkıştırmış."
languages.original_text: "That is possible. But how can they ever expect it to work? Tithe evasion cannot be covered up, especially not by eliminating our delegation. It is as though the governor is painting himself into a corner..."

traits.locale_text: "Bu, mümkün ama işe yaramasını beklemeleri absürt. Aşar kaçırmadan kaçış yoktur, hele heyetimizi ortadan kaldırarak asla. Vali, kendi kendisini köşeye sıkıştırmış resmen."
